items.sentence: Tom sat on the corner of his desk to tie his shoes.
We're moving to Australia at the end of this month.
Tom should be landing in Australia right about now.
You can't learn a language without making mistakes.
Stop getting yourself worked up over little things.
To learn a foreign language requires a lot of time.
Fossil fuels are the main causes of global warming.
Whenever I'm on top of a mountain, I feel grateful.
The artistic beauty of the garden is truly amazing.
The first airplane flew in 1903 for twelve seconds.
